module.name: SIPSTATION
module.description: This module is used to configure, manage and troubleshoot your SIPSTATION(tm) FreePBX.com SIP trunks and DIDs. The license on this source code is NOT GPL Open Source, it is a proprietary Free to Use license.
module.changelog: *15.0.16* Fixing FREEPBX-24234 Firewall issue *15.0.15* Packaging of ver 15.0.15 *15.0.14* FREEI-5141 *15.0.13* FREEPBX-23956 SIPStation tool tip change *15.0.12* FREEI-4669
